bibl.title: Jewish Pilgrimage and Jewish Identity in Hellenistic and Early Roman Egypt.
Pilgrimage and Holy Space in Late Antique Egypt
bibl.author: KERKESLAGER, Allen

bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Pilgrimage to Jewish Temples and Synagogues. - III. Pilgrimage to the Tombs of the Dead. - IV. Pilgrimage to Mt. Sinai. - V. Other Pilgrimage Sites. - VI. Concluding Observations: Jewish Identity in Hellenistic and Early Roman Egypt.
KERKESLAGER Allen, Jewish Pilgrimage and Jewish Identity in Hellenistic and Early Roman Egypt.
David FRANKFURTER (Ed.), Pilgrimage and Holy Space in Late Antique Egypt = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 134 (Leiden, 1998) pp. 99-225, 1 carte.
